Package com.schibsted.account.introspection

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TokenIntrospector
    Interface for introspecting a token.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IntrospectionResult
    The authorization data associated with an introspected access token.
    TokenIntrospectorJWKS
    TokenIntrospectorJWKS validates a JWT token with keys from a JWKS fetched from a URL.
    TokenIntrospectorRemote
    TokenIntrospectorRemote validates a JWT token via a token introspection request.
    TokenValidator
    TokenValidator validates a token, using a list of introspection methods (ordered by priority).
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidTokenException
    InvalidTokenException is the superclass of exceptions thrown when an introspected token is invalid.
    InvalidTokenException.IncorrectIssuer
    Thrown when the issuer of the token does not match the expected identifier.
    InvalidTokenException.IntrospectionFailed
    Thrown when the token could not be introspected.
    InvalidTokenException.MissingRequiredAudience
    Thrown when the intended audience of the token does not match the expected identifier.
    InvalidTokenException.MissingRequiredScopes
    Thrown when all the required scopes are not in the token.
